name: Year Up Bay Area
description: Free professional training, paid corporate internship, and career placement for ages 18-29
fullDescription: Year Up provides young adults ages 18-29 with skills training, corporate internships, and support to launch careers in high-growth industries like tech, finance, and healthcare.
whatTheyOffer:
- 6 months of professional skills training
- 6-month corporate internship with major companies
- Weekly stipend during program
- College credits (transferable)
- Career coaching and job placement support
- Alumni network and ongoing support
- Training in IT, software, financial operations, and more
howToGetIt:
1. Must be 18-29 years old
2. High school diploma or GED required
3. Must be authorized to work in U.S.
4. Must be available full-time for 12 months
5. Apply online at Year Up website
6. Complete admissions process (interview, assessments)
keywords: Year Up, young adults, career training, tech jobs, internship, professional skills, 18-29, IT, software, help desk, corporate internship
